summary: A real life documentary following the events of September 11 from an insider's view, through the lens of James Hanlon and two French filmmakers who were in Manhattan that one day.
cast: Tony Benatatos|Jamal Braithwaite|Steve Buscemi|Joe Casaliggi|Robert De Niro|James Hanlon|Gédéon Naudet|Jules Naudet|Joseph Pfeifer|Tom Spinard|Dennis Tardio|George W. Bush|Mychal Judge
director: Directors: James Hanlon, Gédéon Naudet | 1 more credit »
title: 11S: Lo nunca visto
